entry.title: Top Putin critic Alexei Navalny 'comatose' after reportedly being poisoned

media:group.media:title: Top Putin critic Alexei Navalny 'comatose' after reportedly being poisoned
media:group.media:description:
A spokesperson for a prominent critic of Vladimir Putin says the Russian opposition leader’s condition has been stabilized after the suspected poisoning; Amy Kellogg reports.
